page.title: 17COCKFIELD VILLAGE HALL 2
page.content: The School uses the large hall part of the Village Hall for physical education,games,drama,music and move- ment,services,wet playtimes,concerts and the Christmas party.For each morning and for three afternoons each week, the hall is part of the school. The extension is also used for showing films and film strips.Everyday the hall is used as a dining hall by the school children.It's area is 153 sq.metres. On Tuesdays and Fridays the committee is used by the Lavenham doctors for a surgery for the people of Cockfield.It is also used as a polling station during elections.Some of the rules are: you must leave the Hall as you found it and if you break anything you must pay for it;you must switch off the heater and lights when you leave.The Hall has proved a great help to the children and the people of Cockfield.;
